Uses of Interface
squidpony.squidmath.SkippingRandomness

  • Packages that use SkippingRandomness 
    Package Description
    squidpony.squidmath
    A very broad package containing random number generators, geometry tools, and some classes for combinatorics.

    • Uses of SkippingRandomness in squidpony.squidmath

      Classes in squidpony.squidmath that implement SkippingRandomness 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LightRNG
      This is a SplittableRandom-style generator, meant to have a tiny state that permits storing many different generators with low overhead.
      class  MoonwalkRNG
      An IRNG implementation that allows the extra functionality of a StatefulRandomness and a SkippingRandomness, as well as allowing reverse-lookup of the state that produced a long using the static MoonwalkRNG.inverseNextLong(long) method, and distance checks between two generated numbers with the static MoonwalkRNG.distance(long, long) method.
      class  PermutedRNG
      This is a RandomnessSource in the PCG-Random family.
      class  TangleRNG
      A variant on ThrustAltRNG that gives up some speed, but allows choosing any of 2 to the 63 odd-number streams that change the set of possible outputs this can produce (amending the main flaw of ThrustAltRNG).
      class  ThrustAltRNG
      A variant on ThrustRNG that gives up a small amount of speed to attain better quality.
      class  ThrustRNG
      A hybrid of the type of algorithm LightRNG uses with some of the specific steps of a linear congruential generator.
      class  VortexRNG
      A 64-bit generator based on ThrustAltRNG but with 2 to the 64 possible streams instead of 1 stream.
